H0.text: In the British Army, which commissioned rank is indicated by a crown on each shoulder. Captain

H1.text: In the British Army, which commissioned rank is indicated by a crown on each shoulder. Lieutenant Colonel

H2.text: In the British Army, which commissioned rank is indicated by a crown on each shoulder. Colonel

H3.text: In the British Army, which commissioned rank is indicated by a crown on each shoulder. Maj.

A4.text: Their badge of rank became the imperial crown as worn by regimental sergeant majors up to this point.
